label: underground structure
definition: Underground plant parts having unspecified morphology

label: root
definition: A plant axis lacking shoot nodes and having indeterminate growth

label: corm
definition: An underground shoot system consisting of a short, enlarged stem and buds

label: tuber
definition: A radially enlarged underground plant axis

label: rhizome
definition: A swollen, horizontal underground shoot axis

label: bulb
definition: An underground shoot system having a short stem and bud enclosed by fleshy leaves
